# Country iso doesn't match coutry code and name in the validated flow table


```{r}

rawflow <- readdbtbl("raw_flow_yearly") %>% 
    filter(productcode == 440799) %>% collect()

valid <- readdbtbl("validated_flow_yearly")  %>%
    filter(productcode == 440799) %>% collect()

valid2 <- rawflow %>% clean()

```
